strapiPost.title: Sustainable Trails Conference Happening In Bentonville
strapiPost.content:
The Sustainable Trails Conference in Bentonville is happening this week and though the core conference is sold out, there is still opportunity to register for a couple workshops. 

  • Trail systems: The conference is for organizations involved in trail planning and design, construction and maintenance, or fundraising. The aim of the conference is to improve NWA’s trails and the industry at large while providing access to the world’s highest quality trail professionals. 
  • Workshops: There are six tickets for the Stonework for Trails workshop and six tickets for the Crafting Rock Features with Machinery still available. 

Learn more and register for the workshops HERE.
